title: Listener Tales 7
description:
It's another installment of Listener Tales! Tonight we hear from a Biggie-quoting stalker, a ghostly grandma, a noisy intruder, an attempted drag to Hell and a few more! Enjoy!

Who sponsored this episode? Glad you asked!

Lola
